mapper.sql: id, jgmc, jgmc_en, jgbh, research_field, sljg, sljgmc, ssfy, sssf, datasource_type

SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
mapper.select:
select
from v_ref_org_type
jgbh is not null AND research_field is not null and research_field!='NA'
ORDER BY convert(jgmc using gbk) ASC

select
from v_ref_org_type
research_field!='NA'

SELECT m.jgbh, m.jgmc, m.research_field, m.num_qsjc, m.num_wlkx, m.num_hlhl, m.num_zrkx, m.num_jsfm, m.num_kjjb, IFNULL(n.num_zgkj,0) AS num_zgkj FROM ( SELECT k.jgbh, k.jgmc, k.research_field, k.num_qsjc, k.num_wlkx, k.num_hlhl, k.num_zrkx, k.num_jsfm, IFNULL(l.num_kjjb,0) AS num_kjjb FROM( SELECT i.jgbh, i.jgmc, i.research_field, i.num_qsjc, i.num_wlkx, i.num_hlhl, i.num_zrkx, IFNULL(j.num_jsfm, 0) AS num_jsfm FROM( SELECT g.jgbh, g.jgmc, g.research_field, g.num_qsjc, g.num_wlkx, g.num_hlhl, IFNULL(h.num_zrkx,0) AS num_zrkx FROM( SELECT e.jgbh, e.jgmc, e.research_field, e.num_qsjc, e.num_wlkx, IFNULL(f.num_hlhl,0) AS num_hlhl FROM( SELECT c.jgbh, c.jgmc, c.research_field, c.num_qsjc, IFNULL(d.num_wlkx,0) AS num_wlkx FROM( SELECT a.jgbh, a.jgmc, a.research_field, IFNULL(b.num_qsjc,0) AS num_qsjc FROM ( SELECT jgbh, jgmc, research_field FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field !="NA"
) AS a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(gzdw_std) AS jgmc, COUNT(id) AS num_qsjc FROM v_cas_qiushi_scientist_award
nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear} AND gzdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
)
GROUP BY gzdw_std ) AS b ON a.jgmc = b.jgmc ) AS c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(hjrdw_std) AS jgmc, COUNT(id) AS num_wlkx FROM v_cas_future_prize
hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} AND hjrdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
)
GROUP BY hjrdw_std ) AS d ON c.jgmc = d.jgmc ) AS e LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(gzdw_std) AS jgmc, COUNT(id) AS num_hlhl FROM v_cas_hlhl_award_winner
nd >= #{query.startYear} AND nd <= #{query.endYear} AND gzdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
)
GROUP BY gzdw_std ) AS f ON e.jgmc = f.jgmc ) AS g LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, COUNT(id) AS num_zrkx FROM( SELECT id, first_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家自然科学奖" AND first_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
) AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear}
UNION ALL SELECT id, second_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家自然科学奖" AND second_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
) AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear}
UNION ALL SELECT id, third_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家自然科学奖" AND third_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
) AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear}
) AS t GROUP BY jgmc ) AS h ON g.jgmc = h.jgmc ) AS i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, COUNT(id) AS num_jsfm FROM( SELECT id, first_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家技术发明奖" AND first_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
UNION ALL SELECT id, second_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家技术发明奖" AND second_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
UNION ALL SELECT id, third_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家技术发明奖" AND third_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
) AS t GROUP BY jgmc ) AS j ON i.jgmc = j.jgmc ) AS k LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, COUNT(id) AS num_kjjb FROM( SELECT id, first_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家科学技术进步奖" AND first_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
UNION ALL SELECT id, second_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家科学技术进步奖" AND second_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
UNION ALL SELECT id, third_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家科学技术进步奖" AND third_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
) AS t GROUP BY jgmc ) AS l ON k.jgmc = l.jgmc ) AS m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ANY_VALUE(jgmc) AS jgmc, COUNT(id) AS num_zgkj FROM ( SELECT id, first_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家最高科学技术奖" AND first_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
UNION ALL SELECT id, second_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家最高科学技术奖" AND second_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
UNION ALL SELECT id, third_wcdw_std AS jgmc FROM v_cas_china_award_10year_final
jxlb="国家最高科学技术奖" AND third_wcdw_std in ( SELECT jgmc FROM v_ref_org_type
1 = 1
AND research_field IS NOT NULL AND research_field!="NA"
AND hjnf >= #{query.startYear} AND hjnf <= #{query.endYear} )
) AS t GROUP BY jgmc ) AS n ON m.jgmc = n.jgmc
SELECT jgmc, ssfy from v_ref_org_type

SELECT SUM(xzxms) AS xm, ROUND(SUM(xzxm_zjf),2) AS jf FROM v_stat_xdzx AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgmc = b.jgmc AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear}

SELECT SUM(xzxms) AS xm, ROUND(SUM(xzxm_zjf),2) AS jf FROM v_stat_xdzx AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgmc = b.jgmc AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear} AND jgbh IS NOT NULL

SELECT SUM(xzxms) AS xm, ROUND(SUM(xzxm_zjf),2) AS jf FROM v_stat_most_project AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgmc = b.jgmc AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear}

SELECT SUM(xzxms) AS xm, ROUND(SUM(xzxm_zjf),2) AS jf FROM v_stat_most_project AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgmc = b.jgmc AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear} AND jgbh IS NOT NULL

SELECT SUM(xzxms) AS xm, ROUND(SUM(xzxm_zjf),2) AS jf FROM v_stat_nsfc_project AS a, v_ref_org_type AS b
a.jgmc = b.jgmc AND nf >= #{query.startYear} AND nf <= #{query.endYear} AND jgbh IS NOT NULL
